Functional Medicine & Chiropractic serving the Front Range with offices in Denver & Longmont, Colorado since 2010. | Alternative Family Medicine & Chiropractic is a Functional Medicine and Chiropractic practice with offices in Denver & Longmont, Colorado. Open since 2010, we specialize in functional blood chemistry interpretation, nutritional and lifestyle remediation, therapeutic-grade nutritional supplementation and a highly curated selection of all natural and herbal remedies. Additionally, our doctors practice both low and high force chiropractic adjusting, Graston Therapy, dry needling as well as other manual modalities such as scar tissue remediation and visceral manipulation.
cleaned_text: Alternative Family Medicine & Chiropractic Alternative Medicine Denver, Colorado 20 followers Functional Medicine & Chiropractic serving the Front Range with offices in Denver & Longmont, Colorado since 2010. About us Alternative Family Medicine & Chiropractic is a Functional Medicine and Chiropractic practice with offices in Denver & Longmont, Colorado. Open since 2010, we specialize in functional blood chemistry interpretation, nutritional and lifestyle remediation, therapeutic-grade nutritional supplementation and a highly curated selection of all natural and herbal remedies. Additionally, our doctors practice both low and high force chiropractic adjusting, Graston Therapy, dry needling as well as other manual modalities such as scar tissue remediation and visceral manipulation. More specifically, in addition to advancing the overall wellness of people of all ages and fitness levels, our doctors are passionate about treating functional metabolic conditions such as thyroid issues, IBS and PCOS. We work with our patients to find the root cause(s) of their chronic conditions so we can work together to change and improve the course of their health journey. - Website - [https://altfammed.com/](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Faltfammed%2Ecom%2F&urlhash=xsPe&trk=about_website) External link for Alternative Family Medicine & Chiropractic - Industries - Alternative Medicine - Company size - 2-10 employees - Headquarters - Denver, Colorado - Type - Privately Held - Founded - 2010 - Specialties - Functional Medicine, Chiropractic, Functional Blood Chemistry, Therapeutic Grade Supplementation, Herbal Remedies, Irritable Bowel Syndrome, Polycystic Ovary Syndrome, Hashimoto's Thyroiditis, Wellness, Thyroid, Hormones, Depression & Anxiety, Specialized Lab Testing, Nutrition, Dry Needling, Graston Therapy, Anti-Aging, Natural Hormone Regulation, Metabolic Conditions, and Acne Locations - Primary 4704 Harlan St Suite 340 Denver, Colorado 80212, US [Get directions](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=4704+Harlan+St+Suite+340+Denver+80212+Colorado+US&trk=org-locations_url) - 1260 S Hover Rd Suite D Longmont, Colorado 80501, US [Get directions](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=1260+S+Hover+Rd+Suite+D+Longmont+80501+Colorado+US&trk=org-locations_url) Employees at Alternative Family Medicine & Chiropractic Similar pages - The Alternative Healthcare Alternative Medicine Haywards Heath, West Sussex - EL Huesero, Alternative Medicine & CBD Alternative Medicine Altamonte Springs, Florida - ALTERNATIVE HEALTH GROUP LLC Alternative Medicine Chicago, Illinois - The Medicine Garden Wellness Centre Alternative Medicine Gabriola, BC - Alternative Health Blueprint Alternative Medicine - Alternative Medical Clinic of Tulsa Alternative Medicine Tulsa, OK - ACUPRESSURE/ACUPUNCTURE & ALTERNATIVE MEDICINE INSTITUTE Alternative Medicine jodhpur, rajasthan - Complementary Alternative Medicine Corp.
